overview:
Sudhir has a degree in Electronics & Telecommunication Engineering from Jadavpur University & an MBA from Cochin University of Science & Technology. Sudhir has over 10 years experience in Online Marketing. He is one of the earliest & top-most Online Marketers from India. He has worked for various B2B & B2C portals including foreign portals.

Sudhir has Domain expertise in all the areas of the Online Industry like Search Engine Optimization, Pay Per Click Advertising, ECommerce, Online Media Planning, Online Sales, Web Analytics, Portal operations, Web Content Management, Social Media Optimisation, Payment Gateway, DNS Management, Online PR, Online Reputation Management etc.,
